author: remm
msg: - The error report valve should use the internal response object to ignore the commit

author: remm
msg: - The error dispatcher will recycle the facades before forwarding to an error
page (of course, if the underlying response has been committed, it will still fail),
so that you can use an error page along with sendError.

author: remm
msg: - Recycle the facades between each request.
